name: FCB New Zealand
description:
FCB is one of New Zealand's top advertising, marketing and communications agencies. The company is ranked among New Zealand’s “Best Workplaces” in 2011, 2012 and 2013 and led by the “CEO of the Year”.
They specializes in Advertising, Integrated Communications, Creative, Media Planning/Buying, Social Media, Branding, Strategy/Planning, Social Marketing, Digital, Mobile, Direct/CRM,Integrated Marketing, Promotion, Public Relations, Community Engagement and Multicultural/Maori Communications.
